item.title: About the exploiting croissants initiative
item.description: Check the description ⬇️ # This page is currently a work in progress (I am still trying to find a cool way of displaying my contact information, I guess that’s my personal issue here). That being said, you can still write “summary” on the terminal version of the website and fetch my contact card, or if you want to jump straight to the point, you can simply access my GitHub repo.
